citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 AM on
21-Dec-16.
Upon arrival, called the exhibitor who stated he was out of town.
